Name: Alexander Cocktail
Description: Shake well, stir, and pour over ice.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Agite bien, revuelva y vierta sobre hielo.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 잘 흔들어서 젓고, 얼음 위에 부어주세요.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Gut schütteln, umrühren und über Eis gießen.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Bien agiter, brasser et verser sur la glace.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Agite bem, mexa e mergulhe sobre gelo.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Хорошо встряхните, перемешайте и залейте льдом.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: İyi çalkala, karıştır ve buzun üstüne dök
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 亚历山大鸡尾酒。摇匀，搅拌，倒入冰。
